property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a non-resource card.
Put the card on the top of its owner's deck.
RECUR: [O][O][O]
COST: Use this only if this card is in your discard pile. Pay 3. Pick a character. Remove this card from the game.
EFFECT: Put the character into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE CONTIGUOUS DEFALCATING MACHINE
When a character enters play, its controller must choose one of the following:
OPTION 1
Put a resource they control into its owners's hand.
OPTION 2
Destroy that character.
OPTION 3
Their faction loses 3 influence.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is destroyed, put it into its owner's hand, then discard a card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Choose one of the following as this card's rules text:
OPTION 1
EXTRA COST: An opponent may detach up to 3 resources.
EFFECT: You may search your deck for an Arcanist character and reveal it. If you do, put it into your hand.
OPTION 2
EXTRA COST: Choose a number for X. Deplete X characters you control.
EFFECT: Detach X+3 resources from your faction.
OPTION 3
EXTRA COST: Pick a character.
EFFECT: This turn, the character gains COVERT.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick an opponent. Look at that player's face-down resources and pick one.
You may destroy that card. If you do, that player may draw a card and may play a resource.

property.name: Text
property.value:
This card cannot be picked.
All characters in your hand gain TACTICAL.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card restores, it gains COVERT this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value:
This card gains 1 strength and 1 life for each face-down resource each opponent controls.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value:
When this card attacks, pick an opponent. That player discards a card.
[O][O][O][O][O][O]: When this card inflicts battle damage to an opponent's faction, that faction's owner discards a card.

property.name: Text
property.value:

When this card enters play, if you picked a character or location as part of its cost and the character has strength 3 or less or the location has structure 3 or less, put that card into its owners's hand.

property.value:

PASS

EFFECT: Put the character into its owner's hand. That character's controller may detach up to X resources from their faction.

property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character you control.
You may put a resource you control into its owner's hand. Flip the character face-down under its owner's control.
FLIP UP: 2 [V]

property.name: Subtype
property.value: 31f, mercenary

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character you control.
If the picked character would be dealt damage, deal damage to this card instead. If the picked character would leave play, this character leaves play in that way instead.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a location. Pick a character.
Inflict X damage to the character, where X is the location's structure. Draw a card.
FLIP UP: 3 [R]

property.name: Text
property.value:
GO TIME!
COST: Deplete this card.
EFFECT: Shuffle your deck and then reveal the top card. If the revealed card is a character, put that card into play, otherwise put it on the bottom of your deck. The character can attack even if it has not been in play under your control since the start of the turn. If that character would leave play or is in play at the end of the turn, remove it from the game instead.
AT ANY COST!
COST: Pay 2. Inflict 3 damage to this card.
EFFECT: Restore this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play you may pick a character. If you do, deplete that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: [R][R][R][R][R][R]: This card gains 1 strength, 1 life and 1 speed.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only during your turn not during a battle. Pick a character you control. Pick a character an opponent controls. You may pick a location.
If the picked character you control is a "dragon", X is 2 times its strength, otherwise X is its strength. Inflict X damage to each picked card.
FLIP UP: 1 [R][R][R]

property.name: Text
property.value:
AGITATE
COST: Pay 1. Lose 2 influence.
EFFECT: This turn, this card gains " PROVIDES: [R][R][R] ".
[R][R][R][R][R][R]: This card gains 2 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value:
TACTICAL
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only not during a battle.
When this card enters play, pick another character. At the start of the next turn that character gains 3 strength for that turn.

property.name: Text
property.value:
When a card that provides at least [R] enters play under your control, you may put a token on this card.
This card gains 1 strength and 1 life for each token on it.

property.name: Text
property.value:
TACTICAL
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only not during a battle. You may pick an item.
When this card enters play, if you picked an item as part of its cost, destroy that item.
[R][R][R][R][R][R]: When this card enters play you may pick a location. If you do, inflict 2 damage to that card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only not during a battle. Pick a character you control. X is that character's strength. Destroy the character. Pick another character.
Inflict X+1 damage to the character.
FLIP UP: 3 [R]

property.name: Text
property.value:
This card enters play with 3 tokens on it.
At the start of your turn put a token on this card.
When there are at least 6 tokens on this card, destroy it. If you do, each opponents' faction loses 6 influence.
When there are no tokens on this card destroy it.
CONTROL THE FLAME!
COST: Any player may use this ability. Destroy a character or item you control.
EFFECT: Add or remove a token from this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn you may pick a character. If you do, that character gains 1 strength this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick an opponent's character with the highest strength. (If there is tie, you decide which character is picked.)
This turn, the character cannot block.
FLIP UP: 2 [R]

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character you control.
When this card enters play, destroy the picked character.
If this character would be put into your discard pile from anywhere, shuffle it into your deck instead.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: rudo, fighter

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE RUDOLPHUS
When this card enters play, deplete all other characters you control. They cannot be restored by your faction's RESTORE RULE.
This character gains 1 strength for each depleted warlord character you control.

property.name: Text
property.value:
When this card inflicts damage to a faction, destroy this card and inflict 2 damage to your faction.
This character cannot block.
[R][R][R][R][R][R]: This card loses all other rules text and loses 1 speed.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: padamose, emperor, mau

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE PADAMOSE
At the end of an opponent's turn, you may remove this card from the game, then choose a player and search their deck for a UNIQUE JO, UNIQUE EUSTACE, UNIQUE PLUCK, UNIQUE RUDOLPHUS, or UNIQUE IGNATIOUS and reveal it. If you do, put it into play under your control.
FLIP UP: 2 [V][V][V][V]

property.name: Text
property.value:
Choose one of the following as this card's rules text:
OPTION 1
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only during your turn.
EFFECT: You may search your deck for a "dragon" card and reveal it. If you do, put it into your hand.
OPTION 2
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only during your turn. Pick a character.
EFFECT: Deplete the character. Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
This card cannot be restored by your faction's RESTORE RULE.
This card can attack only once each turn.
ASSIST
COST: Pay 2. Deplete a character you control.
EFFECT: Restore this card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
When this card enters play, you may pick a character. If you do, inflict 2 damage to the character.
If this card would be destroyed, you may pay 2. If you do, put it into play as a face-down resource under its owners's control instead.
MOVE
COST: Pay 2. Pick a character.
EFFECT: Attach this card to the character if you can. (if you can't, this card remains in play)
FLIP UP: 2 [R]

property.name: Text
property.value: [V]: When a character inflicts battle damage to a faction, X is the number of threshold icons of the character. Inflict X damage to that character's controller's faction.

property.name: Text
property.value:
TO BEAR ARMS
COST: Pay 1. Pick a character. Destroy a restored character you control.
EFFECT: Inflict 2 damage to the character.
JUST UNBEARABLE: [R][R][R][R][R][R]
COST: Pay 2. Pick a character. Destroy a restored character you control.
EFFECT: Inflict 5 damage to the character.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card gains 1 strength and 1 life for each [V] you control.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only during your turn and not during a battle.
X is the total strength of all characters your opponents control. Inflict X-3 damage to all characters.
